subject: Simsonn Plus Brake Pedal - Replacement
description_text:
Hello,

I am not too sure what happened, my brake pedal just died on me. In the
software it shows it's continuous at 100%, i have readjusted the
cables/wires multiple times but the issue has not been resolved.

How much would a replacement pedal cost me? I only need 1x Braked pedal as
my Throttle and Clutch are working fine.

[image: image.png]

Thank you,
Ryan H.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4889 中
